reasoning: Fibromatosis encompasses desmoid fibromatosis, infantile myofibromatosis, and other fibrous tissue proliferations. Desmoid fibromatosis incidence ~2-5 per 100k, infantile form rare (~0.5 per 100k). Aggregate estimate ~2.5 per 100k. Moderate confidence due to heterogeneous subtypes and limited systematic epidemiological studies.
source: Clinical epidemiology of desmoid fibromatosis from regional registries (various 2000-2005)
